role.name: Print Designer
role.description: Conceptualizing designs, preparing mockups, and creating final designs for printing.

role.name: UI/UX Designer
role.description: Creating user-friendly interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.

role.name: Web Developer
role.description: Developing applications with the best practices in mind and delivering high-quality applications.

about.description:
After completing my Diploma in Computer Science, I began working as a Graphic Designer.

  However, I soon realized that what I really wanted to do was work as Software Engineer, so I started learning from online seminars. During my studies, I learned to code HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Ionic, Angular — all of which were essential to my eventual success as a Web Application Developer.
  
  Since then, I have been able to further expand my skills on my own and have learned React, React Native, Express, Redux, Mobx State Management, all in efforts to becoming a better Developer.
  
  My top priority is exceeding my biggest expectations and focusing on growing to be a Software Engineer.

list.text: Designed and Developed over 20+ Ionic v5 Cordova Hybrid Mobile Applications using Angular, Typescript, Node.js, HTML5, SCSS.
Designed and Developed prototypes using React Native.
Determining the structure and design of web pages.
Developing features to enhance the user experience.
Striking a balance between functional and aesthetic design.
Building reusable code for future use.
Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design.
Coordinating with other team members to ensure timely completion of projects.
Created user-centered designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback
Created user flows, wireframes, prototypes and mockups
Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns and attractive user interfaces
Designing UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components
Created original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
Identifying and troubleshooting UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
Collaborating effectively with product, engineering, and management teams
Researching concepts, designs, reference material, and similar work.
Rendering and presenting design mockups for revision and feedback.
Implementing feedback revision and creating final designs for printing.
Reviewing and proofreading designs to ensure that copy, layout, and dimensions are print-ready.
Overseeing the printing process to ensure color quality and consistency.
Managing the timelines and workflow of print design projects.
Communicating updates, feedback, and issues with the clients and managers.
Maintaining the brand's consistency across all designs and printed materials.
Keeping up to date with the latest design trends, techniques, and printing standards.

topics.description: An electronics retailer's app and website were due for an update. Sales were going up the roof, and customers were getting a little antsy with the old-school interface, begging for something that would make their shopping experience easier and more engaging. The owners weren't afraid to try a new style or to break some rules—they had been in business for years and had seen trends come and go without losing any of their loyal customers.

Input from focus groups showed that people liked the store's selection of big-ticket items, but they also wanted to be able to find what they needed quickly. They wanted a shop that offered the best deals on electronics, with the best quality products. They wanted to have access to knowledgeable salespeople who could answer any questions about products or help them choose one that was right for them.

topics.topic: Your next car is waiting for you.
topics.description: You can even choose which one you want to see.

If you're like most people, you dread going to the dealership when you need to buy a new car. You worry that there aren't any cars in your price range, or that they won't have a car to fit your needs. Maybe you do not even like the whole experience of going into a dealership and dealing with the pressure they put on you. It's no wonder people put off buying a new car until they absolutely have to… Or don't buy one at all.
This app will let users browse cars online and decide which one they want to see, right then and there, without having to go into the dealership at all.

It'll show them pictures, give them information on fuel efficiency, show them comparisons between models, and even let them know if there are any cars waiting for them nearby. All the user has to do is click see at home on the vehicle he wants to test drive, and dealership will send over a tow truck so that he can take it for a spin—no matter how far away it is from the dealership! The driver won't even have to worry about returning it because the dealership will take it back too.

topics.topic: After you are enlisted as a member of the gym, this application allows you to schedule and/or book spinning classes, personal trainers, and any other desired activities that your gym offers - all in the palm of your hands! This flexible and accessible approach that this application offers, will help you organize your gym time and preferences to your convenience. No more lines, calls, or wait times! Scheduling ahead of time will be your best option to never miss a gym day again.

topics.description: Wireframe of the app
Select any of the spinning cycle classes and get started with the trainer you prefer.
Choose your own personal trainer depending on your gender
Purchase a package and with exciting offers
Zumba, Yoga, Pilates, Kickboxing, and more classes to choose from.
Join our events alone or with a friend and get the best of the best.
Change your email, password, and more

The character and beauty of the antique, vintage and antique jewellery is what makes it so appealing to customers. The owner wanted to give customers an easy way to access the vast collection and bring this beautiful treasure into their homes. He created an app that allows customers to buy from his shop from anywhere at any time. Customers can simply use the app to discover a piece of jewellery that's perfect for them, purchase it, and have it delivered right to their door.

Sitting around with friends watching football and arguing about who knows more about football is fun, but it can be difficult to keep track of whose team is winning, who's winning the trivia and by how much. There are plenty of apps out there that tell you the scores, but what if you want a prediction app that tells you which team will be in the lead at any time? In response to this need, our client came to us with a great idea: make an all-in-one app combining scores, statistics and trivia that allows users to predict who will be in the lead at any given time.

With ecommerce booming, the world is becoming a smaller place in terms of trade. We wanted to take this thought one step further and bring the shopping experience to you, the customer. With multiple vendors and products at your fingertips, you can shop for everything from electronics to clothes to jewelry and receive it at your doorstep. The app will organize items by category, brand or price range so that you can find exactly what you're looking for with just a few swipes. The app will also be able to tell if an item is in stock or not so that you won't waste time on products that are no longer available.

Budget is a well-known brand, located in many countries around the world. The Kuwait branch needed to have its own custom-made website.

Mealz is the best meal planning app on the market. This application provides you with healthy meals of your day like breakfast, lunch and dinner. These meals are prepared by chef personally for you depending on if you want to gain weight or lose weight or build muscle. Mealz is a great tool for anyone who wants to stay healthy and fit. It can be used by people who are looking to lose weight or just those that want to eat healthier. The application is designed to help you make better choices when it comes to eating food so that you can live a healthier lifestyle long term.
